explains: adj. 反语的，讽刺的；（因出乎意料而）奇怪的，好笑的

sentences.en: It is ironic for the leading figure of climate-change opponents to quote this piece.
sentences.cn: 气候变化反对者的主要人物引用这篇文章是具有讽刺意味的。

sentences.en: In Herzau's own home, there was more ironic example when his young son's pet mouse Willy died recently, it was accorded a tearful ceremonial burial in garden.
sentences.cn: 在 Herzau 自己的家里，有一个更具讽刺意味的例子，他年幼的儿子的宠物老鼠 Willy 最近死了，他们泪流满面地在花园里为它举行了一个葬礼。

sentences.en: It is ironic that so many women are anti-feminist.
sentences.cn: 具有讽刺意味的是，竟然有那么多妇女是反对女权主义的。
